knimeNode.name: Substructure Counter
knimeNode.shortDescription: To calculate the number of times a query molecule is present in the input molecule.

fullDescription.intro: This node is used to calculate the number of times a particular query molecule is present in an input molecule. The number of times the query molecule present in the input molecule can be repeated. This node has the option to choose the unique number of times the query molecule is present in the input molecule.
fullDescription.option: The name of the column in first table containing input molecules for which the substructure is to be counted.
The name of the column in second table containing query molecules which will act as substructure for the input molecules
This option is selected if user requires unique matches of the query molecule in an input molecule.

ports.outPort: Input molecule table with one additional column for each row in the query molecule table. The new columns added contains number of times that a query is found in the molecule.
